synopsis.text: Art university student Touko Yatabe presents a heartwarming tale of summer adventures and budding friendships in her graduate project, featuring two young boys named Rintarou and Toshi. After Rintarou unintentionally breaks a cherished Japanese maple leaf fossil belonging to his father, he finds himself unable to confess his mistake. Seeking solace and a possible replacement, Rintarou heads to the riverbank to search for fossils. It is here where he encounters the enigmatic Toshi, and together, the two boys embark on a series of unforgettable experiences. As the days pass, the boys weave a tapestry of memories, forging a bond that helps Rintarou come to terms with his guilt and embrace the true essence of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
